name: You Came, You Saw, We Co-Oped
description: Complete Domains together with other players %var% times.

name: I Came, I Saw, I Conquered
description: Collect %var% regional specialties in another player's world.

name: That's One Big Crystalfly
description: Defeat an Anemo Hypostasis in Co-op Mode.

name: ...And Still Smiling!
description: Defeat an Electro Hypostasis in Co-op Mode.

name: You Have to Hit the Pillars
description: Defeat a Geo Hypostasis in Co-op Mode.

name: Just Me and You, the Sky So Blue, and Almost Getting Killed by a Cryo Regisvine
description: Defeat a Cryo Regisvine in Co-op Mode.

name: This Is Fine
description: Defeat a Pyro Regisvine in Co-op Mode.

name: A Fish Called Rhodeia
description: Defeat an Oceanid in Co-op Mode.

name: Wolf Pact
description: Defeat the king of Wolvendom in Co-op Mode.
